effect:
**Lorraine Lineage** *(Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)*

**On Enter:** Until end of turn, CARDNAME's attacks get +2 [POWER] and gain "**On Kill:** Draw a card."
effect_raw:
Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)

On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 POWER and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."

rule.description: With the On Enter effect, Lorraine's attacks get the additional effects, not Lorraine herself. This means that Lorraine still needs a weapon or attack card in order to declare attacks because she does not have an attack stat.

effect_html: Lorraine Lineage (Lorraine, Blademaster must be leveled from a previous level "Lorraine" champion.)On Enter: Until end of turn, Lorraine's attacks get +2 and gain "On Kill: Draw a card."

effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put all cards from your memory on the bottom of your deck in any order, then draw that many cards.
effect_raw: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put all cards from your memory on the bottom of your deck in any order, then draw that many cards.
flavor:
"Such a curious thing. It seems as though it's alive."
— Rai Kyouki
name: Arcanist's Prism
effect_html: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put all cards from your memory on the bottom of your deck in any order, then draw that many cards.

editions.effect: [Class Bonus] **Remove a durability counter from Clarent:** Prevent the next 1 %non-attack%non-combat% damage that would be dealt to each unit you control this turn. *(Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*

rule.description: The damage prevention effect of Clarent is tracked individually for each unit affected.
You may use Clarent's ability multiple times to effectively prevent more damage.

effect_html: Class Bonus Remove a durability counter from Clarent: Prevent the next 1 non-combat damage that would be dealt to each unit you control this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

effect: [REST]**, Remove an enlighten counter from your champion:** Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
effect_raw: REST, Remove an enlighten counter from your champion: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.
flavor: Its spark glows vibrantly in otherworldly color. Some say the staff has an ominous origin, perhaps from a far more sinister world.
name: Endura, Scepter of Ignition
effect_html: , Remove an enlighten counter from your champion: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Activate this ability only at slow speed.

effect: [Class Bonus] **On Enter:** Each player reveals all cards in their memory. If a fire element card was revealed, choose a unit and deal 3 damage to it. If a water element card was revealed, draw a card. If a wind element card was revealed, each opponent banishes a card at random from their memory.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Each player reveals all cards in their memory. If a fire element card was revealed, choose a unit and deal 3 damage to it. If a water element card was revealed, draw a card. If a wind element card was revealed, each opponent banishes a card at random from their memory.
name: Prismatic Edge

rule.description: For each element, the resulting effect is only performed once regardless of how many of that element is revealed. E.g. If five fire cards were revealed, you only get to deal 3 damage to one unit once.

effect_html: Class Bonus On Enter: Each player reveals all cards in their memory. If a fire element card was revealed, choose a unit and deal 3 damage to it. If a water element card was revealed, draw a card. If a wind element card was revealed, each opponent banishes a card at random from their memory.
